name: contact-form-widget

scripts.restore: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const backup=path.join(__dirname,'netlify/functions/submit-contact.js.backup');const original=path.join(__dirname,'netlify/functions/submit-contact.js');if(fs.existsSync(backup)){fs.copyFileSync(backup,original);console.log('Restored original submit-contact.js');}else{console.log('No backup found');}"

description: A lightweight contact form widget that can be embedded on any website and sends data to Notion database
